Dear Gordan,

After input the proxy address and port using expert setting, the
crawler seeems to work a bit better.

I enter a few seeds for testing, but only one that is working. Details
as below

http://www.exploratorium.edu/  	  Heritrix(-3)-Connection lost   	
Failed to crawl seed

I can access to this site, however, there is a robots.txt on it. The
rest all show failed to crawl seed except the last seed.

http://www.arts.gov/ 	 Heritrix(-61)-Robots prerequisite failure  
Failed to crawl seed

I can access this site via browser, and there is no
http://www.arts.gov/robots.txt

http://www.bagan.net.mm/ 	 Heritrix(-61)-Robots prerequisite failure
 	Failed to crawl seed
Same, i can access this via browser and there is no
http://www.bagan.net.mm/robots.txt

There a few more seeds with similar problems.

http://www.sony.com/ 	 HTTP-200-Success-OK  	Seed successfully crawled

The crawler still running, it downloaded 9xxMB document. But i dont
understand why only sony is ok while the rest all failed.

Any help? Thank you.
